ptero-eggs.name: Icecast-AutoDJ
ptero-eggs.description:
Sets up an Icecast2 streaming server with Liquidsoap as the source. Ideal for internet radio with AutoDJ, live stream, and fallback support. 

Note: A license is required in most countries to publicly stream music.

© Sigma Productions 2025
ptero-eggs.author: info@djfinn.nl

ptero-eggs.name: WebHost Egg
ptero-eggs.description:
Introducing a versatile hosting solution for any website!

With built-in Composer support, simply specify the packages you need in the “Packages” box, and they’ll be installed automatically when the server starts. Want to set up WordPress? Just toggle the WordPress slider during server setup, and WordPress will be ready to go in moments.

Support for Pelican panel & Pterodactyl!

© Sigma Productions 2025
ptero-eggs.author: info@djfinn.nl
